context_text: <B> watched football when i was home at my father's house / <A> mhm / <B> over christmas cause that's what he watches / <A> yeah / <B> so just to be friendly cause i don't see him very often i'd sit and watch football with him / <A> right / <B> something i used to do when i was a kid / <A> uh-huh
